BBjGridExWidget.Filters

Class BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • BBjGridExWidget.Filters.BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGNumber

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BBjGridExWidgetFilterInterface

    public class BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGDate
extends BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGNumber
    The class represents the defualt ag-grid date filter
    Author:
    Hyyan Abo Fakher

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BBjNumber ApplyButton!
      Set to true to have the filter us an Apply button.

      BBjNumber DebounceMs!
      The number of milliseconds to debounce by before applying the filter
      BBjString NewRowsAction!
      If set to 'clear', then setting data into the grid will clear (reset) the filte If set to 'keep' then the grid will keep it's currently set filter.
      BBjNumber SuppressAndOrCondition!
      If true, the filter will only offer Condition 1.

    • Field Detail

      • ApplyButton!

        public BBjNumber ApplyButton!
        Set to true to have the filter us an Apply button. If the Apply button is present, then the filter is only applied after the user hits the Apply button.

      • ClearButton!

        public BBjNumber ClearButton!
        Set to true to have the filter us a Clear button. The Clear button will clear the details of the filter thus resetting it.

      • DebounceMs!

        public BBjNumber DebounceMs!
        The number of milliseconds to debounce by before applying the filter

      • NewRowsAction!

        public BBjString NewRowsAction!
        If set to 'clear', then setting data into the grid will clear (reset) the filte If set to 'keep' then the grid will keep it's currently set filter. The default is 'clear'

      • SuppressAndOrCondition!

        public BBjNumber SuppressAndOrCondition!
        If true, the filter will only offer Condition 1.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGDate

        public BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGDate()
